Room and Area Schedule.description: A standard schedule listing all rooms and their areas, with a final total.

statements.query_string: SELECT Label, Area FROM document WHERE IfcRole = 'Space'
SELECT 'Total', SUM(Area) FROM document WHERE IfcRole = 'Space'

Wall Quantities.description: A schedule that lists all walls and calculates their total length.

statements.query_string: SELECT Label, Length, Height, Width FROM document WHERE IfcType = 'Wall'
SELECT 'Total Length', SUM(Length) FROM document WHERE IfcType = 'Wall'
